FIRST.TITLE: About us
FIRST.PARAGRAPH: For over 20 years, Tunav IT Group has established itself as a leading provider of GPS, IT, and IoT solutions. As a value-added systems integrator, Tunav designs and deploys intelligent technological solutions combining performance and reliability. Our areas of expertise include GPS tracking, fleet management, real-time remote monitoring, and business process optimization, serving the digital transformation of organizations.

SECOND.TITLE: TUNAV in Action!
SECOND.PARAGRAPH: TUNAV IT GROUP recently showcased its presence at FITA 2025, a major event dedicated to cooperation and investment in Africa. On this occasion, we highlighted our commitment to digital transformation through innovative solutions in IoT, cloud computing, and cybersecurity. This event was a tremendous opportunity to showcase our expertise, exchange with key industry players, and strengthen our vision: supporting African companies towards effective, sustainable, and secure digitalization.

THIRD.TITLE: Beyond Code: Strengthening People at TUNAV
THIRD.PARAGRAPH: At TUNAV IT GROUP, we believe that performance comes from a united and fulfilled team. That‚Äôs why we regularly organize team-building activities that allow our employees to meet in a friendly setting, strengthen their cohesion, and stimulate creativity outside the professional environment. These privileged moments foster communication, collaboration, and mutual trust while reflecting our values: people, innovation, and sharing.

SIXTH.TITLE: Building Future Solutions Together
SIXTH.PARAGRAPH1: At Tunav IT Group, we believe that innovation is born from collaboration. With over 20 years of experience in GPS, IT, and IoT technologies, we support our partners in implementing tailor-made, efficient, and sustainable projects.
SIXTH.PARAGRAPH2: Do you have a project, a specific need, or a desire to transform your business processes? Let's connect to build solutions tailored to your challenges. Our team is here to listen and ready to tackle your technological challenges.

SLIDE1.DESCRIPTION: We support businesses and individuals with smart GPS tracking and fleet management solutions designed to optimize their performance.

WHATWEDO.TITLE: What We Do
WHATWEDO.PARAGRAPH1: For over 20 years, Tunav IT Group has positioned itself as a leading provider of GPS, IT and IoT solutions. As an integrator of high value-added systems, Tunav designs and deploys intelligent technological solutions, combining performance and reliability. Our areas of expertise cover GPS tracking, fleet management, real-time remote monitoring, as well as business process optimization to support the digital transformation of organizations.

TRANSFORMATION.TITLE: Digital Transformation
TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: We support businesses in their digital transition with innovative, sustainable solutions perfectly integrated with their activity.

IT_SOLUTION.TITLE: IT Solutions
IT_SOLUTION.DESCRIPTION: Our expertise covers cloud computing, software development and remote monitoring, ensuring companies remain competitive in a constantly evolving digital world.

GPS_TRACKING.TITLE: GPS Tracking
GPS_TRACKING.DESCRIPTION: Our geolocation solutions provide reliable and secure real-time tracking of your vehicles, equipment or field teams.

IOT_SOLUTION.TITLE: IoT Solutions
IOT_SOLUTION.DESCRIPTION: Our IoT solutions offer smart monitoring, centralized device management, and advanced security systems to protect your facilities, optimize your operations, and improve your overall efficiency.

GALLERY.TITLE: Our Products
GALLERY.DESCRIPTION: Tunav IT Group offers a complete range of innovative technological solutions combining performance and precision. Our products cover real-time GPS tracking, intelligent fleet management, remote monitoring systems, as well as customized IoT solutions for various sectors. We also offer advanced IT platforms for business process optimization, allowing companies to better manage their resources, secure operations, and accelerate digital transformation.

CLIENTS.TITLE: Our Clients
CLIENTS.DESCRIPTION: Discover the companies that trust us. Our portfolio includes partnerships with industry leaders and top innovators, united by our shared commitment to excellence and quality.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
